StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [RCTAPI_GetEventOpera.onalDataPartCached]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@edipi varchar(10) AS
--RssOss.dbo.RCTAPI_GetEventOpera.onalDataPartCached 1266694055 --DECLARE @edipi varchar(10) --SET @edipi = 1266694055
SET NOCOUNT ON SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @result varchar(max) DECLARE @tempJson varchar(max)
DECLARE @cutO.BeginDate date, @cutO.EndDate date
IF (EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo' AND TABLE_NAME = 'RCTAPI_DateRange')) BEGIN
SELECT @cutO.BeginDate = ( CASE WHEN BeginDate_Datepart = 'year' THEN DATEADD( year, BeginDate_DateAddNumber, GETDATE()) WHEN BeginDate_Datepart = 'month' THEN DATEADD(month, BeginDate_DateAddNumber, GETDATE()) WHEN BeginDate_Datepart = 'week' THEN DATEADD( week, BeginDate_DateAddNumber, GETDATE()) WHEN BeginDate_Datepart = 'day' THEN DATEADD( day, BeginDate_DateAddNumber, GETDATE()) END ), @cutO.EndDate = ( CASE WHEN EndDate_Datepart = 'year' THEN DATEADD( year, EndDate_DateAddNumber, GETDATE()) WHEN EndDate_Datepart = 'month' THEN DATEADD(month, EndDate_DateAddNumber, GETDATE()) WHEN EndDate_Datepart = 'week' THEN DATEADD( week, EndDate_DateAddNumber, GETDATE()) WHEN EndDate_Datepart = 'day' THEN DATEADD( day, EndDate_DateAddNumber, GETDATE()) END ) FROM RSSOSS.[dbo].[RCTAPI_DateRange] WHERE RangeType = 'EVENT' END
IF @cutO.BeginDate IS NULL BEGIN SET @cutO.BeginDate = DATEADD(YEAR, -1, GETDATE()) END
IF @cutO.EndDate IS NULL BEGIN SET @cutO.EndDate = DATEADD(DAY, -62, GETDATE()) END
SELECT TOP 1 u.FirstName ,u.LastName ,rp.rowguid AS Recrui.ngPersonGuid ,ro.ORGANIZATION_ID ,ro.rowguid as OrgGuid INTO #Recruiter FROM UserMgmt.dbo.[User] u INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.PERSON p ON u.FirstName = p.FIRST_NAME AND u.LastName=p.LAST_NAME INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION ro ON u.Sta.on_OrgUnitID = ro.OrgUnitId INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON rp ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = p.PERSON_ID AND rp.ORGANIZATION_ID = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE Dis.nguishedName like '%' + @edipi AND u.IsAc.ve = 1 AND rp.ORGANIZATION_ID = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID ORDER BY LastAc.vityDate DESC
--EventOutcomes SET @tempJson = ( SELECT v.[ID] AS eventOutcomeId ,v.[EventId] AS eventId ,v.[AppointmentOutcomeId] AS eventAppointmentOutcomeId ,v.[InterviewOutcomeId] AS eventInterviewOutcomeId FROM RSSOSS.[USMC].[EventOutcome] v INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.[Event] ev ON ev.ID = v.EventId INNER JOIN #Recruiter r ON ev.Organiza.onId = r.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE ev.StartDate >= @cutO.BeginDate AND ev.StartDate < @cutO.EndDate
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('eventOutcomes'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = ISNULL(@tempJson, '"eventOutcomes":[]')
--EventBene.ts SET @tempJson = ( SELECT v.[ID] AS eventBene.tId ,v.[EventOutcomeId] AS eventOutcomeId ,v.[Bene.tTypeId] AS eventBene.tTypeId ,v.[Comment] AS eventBene.tComment ,v.[Bene.tPriority] AS eventBene.tPriority FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventBene.t] v INNER JOIN RSSOSS.[USMC].[EventOutcome] eo ON eo.Id = v.EventOutcomeId INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.[Event] ev ON ev.ID = eo.EventId INNER JOIN #Recruiter r ON ev.Organiza.onId = r.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE ev.StartDate >= @cutO.BeginDate AND ev.StartDate < @cutO.EndDate
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('eventBene.ts'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"eventBene.ts":[]')
--EventOwners SET @tempJson = ( SELECT v.[ID] AS eventOwnerId ,v.[EventID] AS eventId ,v.[OwnerID] AS ownerId ,v.[CreatorID] AS creatorId FROM RSSOSS.[USMC].[EventOwners] v INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.[Event] ev ON ev.ID = v.EventId INNER JOIN #Recruiter r ON ev.Organiza.onId = r.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE ev.StartDate >= @cutO.BeginDate AND ev.StartDate < @cutO.EndDate
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('eventOwners'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"eventOwners":[]')
--EventPoolAtendances SET @tempJson = ( SELECT v.[ID] AS eventPoolAtendanceId ,v.[EventId] AS eventId ,v.[PooleeId] AS nwaId ,v.[Show] AS atendance FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[PooleeAtendee] v INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.[Event] ev ON ev.ID = v.EventId INNER JOIN #Recruiter r ON ev.Organiza.onId = r.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE ev.StartDate >= @cutO.BeginDate AND ev.StartDate < @cutO.EndDate
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('eventPoolAtendances'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"eventPoolAtendances":[]')
--WeeklyObjec.ves SET @tempJson = ( SELECT w.[ID] AS weeklyObjec.veId ,w.[MonthlyObjec.veID] AS monthlyObjec.veId ,w.[StartDate] AS startDate ,w.[EndDate] AS endDate ,w.[GoalPercentage] AS goalPercentage ,w.[NwaObjec.ve] AS nwaObjec.ve ,w.[InterviewObjec.ve] AS interviewObjec.ve ,w.[TelephoneCallObjec.ve] AS telephoneCallObjec.ve ,w.[O.ceTra.cObjec.ve] AS o.ceTra.cObjec.ve ,w.[AreaCanvassingObjec.ve] AS areaCanvassingObjec.ve ,w.[HomeVisitObjec.ve] AS homeVisitObjec.ve ,w.[ElectronicProspec.ngObjec.ve] AS electronicProspec.ngObjec.ve ,w.[Comments] AS comment FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MonthlyObjec.ve] mo INNER JOIN #Recruiter r ON mo.[RecruiterID] = r.Recrui.ngPersonGuid INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[WeeklyObjec.ve] w ON mo.Id = w.MonthlyObjec.veID WHERE CAST( (CAST(mo.[Year] as char(4)) + '-' + CAST(mo.[Month] as varchar(2)) + '-1') as date) < @cutO.EndDate
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('weeklyObjec.ves'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"weeklyObjec.ves":[]')
--MonthlyObjec.ves SET @tempJson = ( SELECT mo.[ID] AS monthlyObjec.veId ,mo.[Organiza.onId] AS organiza.onId ,mo.[RecruiterID] AS recruiterID ,mo.[Year] AS [year] ,mo.[Month] AS [month] ,mo.[TelephoneCallABP] AS telephoneCallABP ,mo.[O.ceTra.cABP] AS o.ceTra.cABP ,mo.[AreaCanvassingABP] AS areaCanvassingABP ,mo.[HomeVisitABP] AS homeVisitABP ,mo.[ElectronicProspec.ngABP] AS electronicProspec.ngABP ,mo.[ContractCount] AS contractCount ,mo.[Nwa] AS nwa ,mo.[Interview] AS interview ,mo.[TelephoneCall] AS telephoneCall ,mo.[O.ceTra.c] AS o.ceTra.c ,mo.[AreaCanvassing] AS areaCanvassing ,mo.[HomeVisit] AS homeVisit ,mo.[ElectronicProspec.ng] AS electronicProspec.ng ,mo.[Comments] AS comment FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[MonthlyObjec.ve] mo INNER JOIN #Recruiter r ON mo.[RecruiterID] = r.Recrui.ngPersonGuid WHERE CAST( (CAST([Year] as char(4)) + '-' + CAST([Month] as varchar(2)) + '-1') as date) < @cutO.EndDate
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('monthlyObjec.ves'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"monthlyObjec.ves":[]')
--RecruiterAc.vityAndResults SET @tempJson = ( SELECT rar.[ID] AS recruiterAc.vityAndResultId ,rar.[RecruiterID] AS recruiterId ,rar.[StartDate] AS startDate ,rar.[EndDate] AS endDate ,rar.[RecruiterComments] AS recruiterComment ,rar.[SncoicComments] AS sncoicComment ,rar.[RecruiterCommentsSigned] AS recruiterCommentsSigned ,rar.[SncoicCommentsSigned] AS sncoicCommentsSigned FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[RecruiterAc.vityAndResult] rar INNER JOIN #Recruiter r ON rar.[RecruiterID] = r.Recrui.ngPersonGuid WHERE StartDate < @cutO.EndDate
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('recruiterAc.vityAndResults'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"recruiterAc.vityAndResults":[]')
--TakeOneEvents SET @tempJson = ( SELECT v.[ID] AS eventId ,v.[NumberAdded] AS numberAdded FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[TakeOneEvent] v INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.[Event] ev ON ev.ID = v.Id INNER JOIN #Recruiter r ON ev.Organiza.onId = r.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE ev.StartDate >= @cutO.BeginDate AND ev.StartDate < @cutO.EndDate
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('takeOneEvents'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"takeOneEvents":[]')
--JuniorTalkEvents SET @tempJson = ( SELECT v.[ID] AS eventId ,v.[NumberOfJuniors] AS numberOfJuniors FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[JuniorTalkEvent] v INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.[Event] ev ON ev.ID = v.Id INNER JOIN #Recruiter r ON ev.Organiza.onId = r.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE ev.StartDate >= @cutO.BeginDate AND ev.StartDate < @cutO.EndDate
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('juniorTalkEvents'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"juniorTalkEvents":[]')
--StudentListEvents SET @tempJson = ( SELECT v.[ID] AS eventId ,v.[NumberOfMaleStudents] AS numberOfMaleStudents FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[StudentListEvent] v INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.[Event] ev ON ev.ID = v.Id INNER JOIN #Recruiter r ON ev.Organiza.onId = r.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE ev.StartDate >= @cutO.BeginDate AND ev.StartDate < @cutO.EndDate
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('studentListEvents'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"studentListEvents":[]')
--SeniorTalkEvents SET @tempJson = ( SELECT v.[ID] AS eventId ,v.[NumberOfSeniors] AS numberOfSeniors FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[SeniorTalkEvent] v INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.[Event] ev ON ev.ID = v.Id INNER JOIN #Recruiter r ON ev.Organiza.onId = r.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE ev.StartDate >= @cutO.BeginDate AND ev.StartDate < @cutO.EndDate
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('seniorTalkEvents'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES ) SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"seniorTalkEvents":[]')
--YouthPhysicalFitnessEvents SET @tempJson = ( SELECT v.[ID] AS eventId ,v.[NumberOfStudents] AS numberOfStudents FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[YouthPhysicalFitnessEvent] v INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.[Event] ev ON ev.ID = v.Id INNER JOIN #Recruiter r ON ev.Organiza.onId = r.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE ev.StartDate >= @cutO.BeginDate AND ev.StartDate < @cutO.EndDate
FOR JSON PATH, ROOT('youthPhysicalFitnessEvents'), INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES )
SET @tempJson = SUBSTRING(@tempJson, 2, LEN(@tempJson)-2) SET @result = @result + ',' + ISNULL(@tempJson, '"youthPhysicalFitnessEvents":[]')
SET @result = '{' + @result + '}' SELECT @result
DROP TABLE #Recruiter
